Experience design consulting

May, 2014

I am currently an Experience Designer at SapientNitro where I research and sketch to design prototypes for large-scale websites. A portfolio of select deliverables is available by request.

Read more

Digital learning platform

May, 2012

Gather is a concept service which provides a single access point for digital learning in schools. It connects assorted resources and tools to make it easy for teachers to construct their own curriculum in a way that works for students.

Read more

Career guidance service for students

April, 2012

Mathplus is a concept service which helps math-inclined students identify potential career paths in high school. It aims to assist students in the job market by introducing them to successful professionals, practical applications for their skills, and example career paths.

Read more

Various motion graphics

March, 2012

Motion has been an important part of my design process going back to my start in TV production in high school where I learned motion design in After Effects.
